articles.title: Commentary: Indonesia is Asia's new COVID-19 epicentre - CNA
articles.description: The resumption of economic activity and domestic travel contributed to the regional surge in COVID-19 cases, says a researcher.
articles.content:
KUALA LUMPUR: Southeast Asian countries have recorded unprecedented spikes in daily case numbers and deaths during the last several weeks.
